mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_job_open (id, j_title, j_stitle, j_content, j_gbn_cd, s_dt, e_dt, educat_cd, career_cd, preferences, work_place, work_time, work_type, inst_id) VALUES (#{job.id}, #{job.jTitle}, #{job.jStitle}, #{job.jContent}, #{job.jGbnCd}, #{job.sDt}, #{job.eDt}, #{job.educatCd}, #{job.careerCd}, #{job.preferences}, #{job.workPlace}, #{job.workTime}, #{job.workType}, #{job.instId})

INSERT INTO tbl_file (file_gbn_cd, file_ref_id, file_name, file_ext, file_url, inst_id) VALUES
(#{file.fileGbnCd}, #{file.fileRefId}, #{file.fileName}, #{file.fileExt}, #{file.fileUrl}, #{file.fileRefId})
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, COALESCE(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT b.stack_cd ORDER BY b.stack_cd SEPARATOR ','), '') AS skills FROM tbl_job_open a LEFT JOIN tbl_job_open_stack b ON a.j_no = b.j_no WHERE a.j_no = #{id}
SELECT a.* FROM tbl_file a left join tbl_job_open b ON a.file_ref_id = b.j_no where a.file_ref_id = #{id};
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_job_open SET j_title = #{job.jTitle}, j_stitle = #{job.jStitle}, j_content = #{job.jContent}, j_gbn_cd = #{job.jGbnCd}, s_dt = #{job.sDt}, e_dt = #{job.eDt}, educat_cd = #{job.educatCd}, career_cd = #{job.careerCd}, preferences = #{job.preferences}, work_place = #{job.workPlace}, work_time = #{job.workTime}, work_type = #{job.workType} WHERE j_no = #{jNo}
mapper.select: SELECT *, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_job_open where id = #{id} group by id) as jobOpenCount FROM tbl_user a LEFT JOIN tbl_company b ON a.id = b.id LEFT JOIN tbl_file c ON b.id = c.file_ref_id AND c.file_gbn_cd = '10' WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.j_no, b.r_no, b.jr_no, d.name, d.id, d.addr, c.r_title, c.del_yn, b.inst_dt, c.career_cd, b.jr_gbn_cd, c.r_rep_yn, d.use_yn FROM tbl_job_open a LEFT JOIN tbl_resume_job_open b ON a.j_no = b.j_no LEFT JOIN tbl_resume c ON b.r_no = c.r_no LEFT JOIN tbl_user d ON c.inst_id = d.id WHERE a.j_no = #{id} AND c.del_yn != 'Y' AND b.jr_gbn_cd NOT IN ('F', 'P') AND d.use_yn != 'N';
SELECT * FROM tbl_user a LEFT JOIN tbl_resume b ON a.id = b.inst_id WHERE a.id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT Into tbl_resume_job_open (j_no, r_no, jr_gbn_cd, inst_id) values (#{jNo}, #{rNo}, 'N', #{id})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_codeinfo c WHERE c.cd IN (SELECT DISTINCT stack_cd FROM tbl_job_open_stack WHERE j_no = #{jNo}) AND (c.up_cd = 'stack_cd' OR c.up_cd IN (SELECT cd FROM tbl_codeinfo WHERE up_cd = 'stack_cd'));
